gameDetails.name: The Crew: Flight to the ISS
gameDetails.description:
This expansion adds 3 new missions; the base game is unchanged.
It was published in the German and English versions of Spielbox 2/2020.
Was also available as part of the rewards for backing Game Boy Geek 2021 Kickstarter campaign.

First mission:
Distribute the playing cards and, in turn starting with the commander, announce how many tricks the crew member on your left will take. The mission is accomplished when all tricks have been played and all announcements were correct.

Second mission:
Draw 4 tasks. All 4 tasks must be fulfilled in 4 consecutive tricks.

Third Mission:
Place the blue 1, 2, 3 and 4 task cards in the middle of the table instead of drawing 4 random cards from the task deck.
